Reviews.Title: Never expected treat
Reviews.Author: William Brooker "WGJB"
Reviews.Content: I've had the phone for a short time and have excellent reception in places that with previous cells were terrible.  It's simple to use and has amany great features.  I have had no trouble hearing or being heard.  So far this phone has been great.

Reviews.Title: Great economy phone.
Reviews.Author: Magner Cepeda
Reviews.Content: This phone is excellent for people like me who do not use it too much, because it's very economical. I load $25 every 3 months and still have most of the money rolled over for the next period. It has lots of useful features, like E-mail, Windows Live Messenger connection, etc. The keyboard is very easy to use. The display is easy to read. It has music player, Bluetooth(which makes it easier to load music, photos, text, etc. from my computer, and to print photos directly). I'm very happy with it. Only thing I regret is not having bought the 4GB card, It's worthy if you plan to use it as an MP3 player, since the 2GB original card doesn't have much space left to store files. I think the bigger card should come standard with the phone. It's  impossible to find accesories for this phone on regular stores, you have to do it through the internet only. Other than that, I strongly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: The right choice for the right price
Reviews.Author: Louis L. Salernojr
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth cell phone but my first with a qwerty key pad as well as more features than I will ever use...but maybe not. I may just take advantage as I have learned over the weeks since the purchase how easy it is to use as well as convenient beyond belief to have a dependable solid phone. I purchased this as I did not want to enter into a new contract with AT&T; but I needed to replace my phone. I believe that I chose a winner.Thanks Samsung for developing/designing/manufacturing it and Amazon for making the price right.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Chelsea M. "Chels"
Reviews.Content: I've only had the phone for day but so far everything is great. Only thing is that the buttons are too small but I'll get used to it. For the price, it is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Best phone I have ever owned!
Reviews.Author: Pretzel
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone since it came out and it is by far the best phone I have owned! The only problem I have ever had with it was every once in a blue moon my service won't work so I simply turn it off anf back on and it's fixed. This phone in indestructable! I dropped it on my concrete driveway which is a slope since I live on a hill, slid the whole way down, only a few scratches. I have dropped it many other times, usually on concrete. My dog chewed it up and bent the back from his teeth, and went to the fair and had it thrown out of my pocket on a ride. Found my phone in one spot, battery in another, and the back in yet another place. Put it together and still works great! Will deffiniftly be getting a new one "and a case!" soon!

Reviews.Title: Great little phone
Reviews.Author: theblakes
Reviews.Content: This phone was great for the most part. Cute, light weight, and great functions. I do have two things I didn't like at all about this phone. When I used the internet for a while, anywhere for 5-30 minutes, it liked to shut itself down and restart randomly. And the buttons while texting are more flush than I like, I like bubbled to I can tell when I hit a key. Otherwise it was a fun little phone and I was sad  to see it go when I switched to a new phone.

Reviews.Title: This phone is make out of tank medal!
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for almost 2 years now. I love it! It is not the highest tech phone out there, but it works like charm. My battery life can last about 2 to 3 days just depending on how much time I talk to someone. This phone can take a beating! One time I have dropped this phone off three flights of stairs and it was like nothing happen to it, other than some minor scratches! The last phone I had fell off the couch and the screen went black and broke.However it does have its problems. The buttons to text are very small and my thumbs are wide, so I can only text with one hand. If you want a phone that can do internet, apps, etc. go for another phone. Internet on this phone sucks. Also, sometimes calls will not go threw, this doesn't happen very much, but it does happen. All in all, good phone if you just want the basics: talk, text, take pictures, and picture texts.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the basic user
Reviews.Author: Bar Rag
Reviews.Content: The perfect phone for a basic user. The screen is well lit, and although the  the numbers and letters are small, it is very easy to text and call on the fly.  It is strong and durable, which a work phone should be!!! I would recommend this  phone to anyone who works construction, or out of doors most of the time

Reviews.Title: Dependable Prepaid Phone
Reviews.Author: nu3ll
Reviews.Content: Great build quality with this solid AT&T; GoPhone. Perfect for the person who doesn't require a full fledged smartphone but, still has bluetooth and a decent camera for on the go. Great standby battery life in a small lightweight package.

Reviews.Title: Less Than 3 Months and Dead
Reviews.Author: Cheryl-Renae's Daughter
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone on April 22 and recieved it a few days later. I loved it. The customer reviews on it said it was good and I missed having a full keyboard so I decided to buy it to replace my full touch screen. I've had it less than 3 months, and last night it gave out. It acts like it wants to turn on, then kicks off and does the same thing. It doesn't stop either. I tried charging it and putting it in rice because I thought it was humidity and heat. Neither worked. With this I am losing over 100 pictures because I haven't bought a memory card yet. I do text a lot, so that may be it, but I'm not sure. Other people say it's great so maybe I just got the bad one of the bunch. Either way for me, it was not worth the $80 that I paid for it. Overall, it's a good phone if you like replacing it every 3 months. If not, I wouldn't recommend it.

Reviews.Title: It's a Phone
Reviews.Author: Virtually Done
Reviews.Content: For a Go Phone, it's good.  The buttons are a little cheap, other than that...it calls people. That's what a phone is supposed to do right? So yes, It works good as "phone" but if your looking for more than just a "phone" (like with games, good camera, hi-tech graphics) .... try something else.

Reviews.Title: Undecided
Reviews.Author: kutiewak
Reviews.Content: people are having trouble hearing me?  Not sure if this is a known issue for the phone itself???  otherwise decent phone, a little larger "step down" from a smart phone than i had expected but not much one can change about that.

Reviews.Title: Randomly Shuts off and Turns on
Reviews.Author: KAZ "kashka"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone and have been using it for the last 6 months.  It is a piece of crap!  I can't keep too many messages in the archives, the camera feature leaves much to be desired and the battery life is nothing compared to other 'go' phones I had.  The worst part about this phone is that it keeps randomly shutting off and restarting itself!  I will be in the middle of a text and it will decide to shut off and then 2 seconds later restart without even saving what I had for a text.  This is the same no matter what function I am using at the time.  It's 'reboot' action will interrupt everything you are doing and delete any progress that you are having.Completely frustrating!  On top of that, the continuous rebooting keeps burning the battery.  I had it 'reboot' itself 9 tiimes in a 15 minute period!  I needed to make a work necessary call and it was unusable during that time!  I am definitely getting a different phone and this one will go into a phone recycle bin- maybe they can use the parts for a remote control toy truck someplace instead as a communication device.Don't buy this product!  BTW- the review says I am in japan, but I have since returned to the US.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: i had to replace my phone due my 5 year old had thrown my in the toilet and i found this to be in my price range I have found that this phone works well i really like it..The only thing that does bother me is the peeping when i txt and i can't seem to figure out how to turm it off..other than that its a great phone andI got it in 3 days and i even order it on a holiday weekend..

Reviews.Title: att phone
Reviews.Author: Melissa Rose
Reviews.Content: works great easy to use takes great pic and wonderful to text with hope to do business with you again

Reviews.Title: Totally works for me!
Reviews.Author: The O
Reviews.Content: I had this phone last year and decided to move up to a contract phone.  I wish I didn't!  This phone always has coverage. And I've never really had a problem with it.  I had one problem, ONCE. I turned it off and back on and there has been no problem since. I have delicate hands, so texting is very easy for me. Probably would be much harder for bigger hands, though. I text a lot, so which the inbox fills much faster then I'd like, I just delete older texts and it's fine.  I'm not that picky.  I just want a reliable phone that works, and that's exactly what this does.  Some of the other reviews made me nervous about buying this phone again.  I wondered if I got lucky the first time, but the second time around was the same as the first.  Everything was completely fine and I love it.

Reviews.Title: my daughter loves it..
Reviews.Author: Deborah Mould
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves her new phone..she has been wanting another one like this one instead of her iphone..not sure how she can spell the words with keys being so small but she loves it and that's all that counts

Reviews.Title: a review from 4 years of usage
Reviews.Author: hljohnson0
Reviews.Content: I've had about 30 different phones including the iphone and this one is the best I have ever owned.Samsung put some real thought into making this phone. You can customize it for convenience and it's the perfectly convenient texting phone.Durability:I've dropped it off a 2 story building and it has been baseball pitched at a concrete wall and I just put the battery back in and it's just fine.I've also dropped it in a full glass of water 4 times, a toilet once (don't ask....), and left it in the rain in the yard accidentally for 2 days when I lost it. I've had it for maybe 4 years now and it's still going strong without any issues.I mean this phone is absolutely ridiculous.I text constantly and charge my phone once or maybe twice a week during extremely heavy usage.Reception:I went hiking for 4 days in Denali National Park Alaska and I was the last person to lose reception. I was the only person with reception in areas where no one with a smart phone could go. WE RELIED HEAVILY ON THIS PHONE FOR EMERGENCIES WITH FULL CONFIDENCE.If you want a reliable, durable phone for calls and texts then look no further.

Reviews.Title: At
Reviews.Author: Judy Silknitter
Reviews.Content: It works good. Great service! Would be happy to do service with them again. Just as discribed. Looking forward to doing business again.

Reviews.Title: Nice Phone
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: I've been using this for several weeks now and am pleased with my purchase. Call clarity is good and that is of importance to me. I didn't want or need a smartphone. This fits my needs nicely.

Reviews.Title: Battery is bad
Reviews.Author: Marusya Boguslavka
Reviews.Content: The phone is only 4 months old and the battery does not charge anymore, and the camera takes bad pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good.
Reviews.Author: La Toya
Reviews.Content: It has texting and calling, a camera, and a few other things. It's not like an iPhone, it doesn't give you weather, but it does have internet access, supposedly, I've never done it. It holds ringtones and stuff, and you have bluetooth. So I guess it's pretty good. :)  Keys are TINY though.

Reviews.Title: THIS PHONE IS CRAP!!!
Reviews.Author: TheTruth
Reviews.Content: This phone is CRAP!!! the keys are too close together, the camera has about .05 megapixels, the texts are not in chronological order, when you do text it lags and the letters get mixed up, there is barely any memory so you can't save any pics or texts, there are no games, and you cannot take videos. So I would recommend 100% to buy this phone, then burn it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy-to-use clamshell phone for voice communication and text messaging--includes $30 airtime credit with AT&T;'s GoPhone service
Pay for just the minutes you use with no annual contract--easy refill via Internet or prepaid cards
VGA camera for still photos; Bluetooth; speakerphone; access to personal e-mail and instant messaging services
Up to 6 hours of talk time, up to 300 hours (12.5 days) of standby time; released in September, 2010
What's in the Box: handset, rechargeable battery, charger, operating instructions, GoPhone SIM card
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung a187 Prepaid GoPhone (AT&T) with $15 Airtime Credit
